name: 夏珮玲
objective:
課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

From the textbook and class activities, students will be able to improve English proficiency in comprehending reading materials, activate knowledge, increase reading fluency and cultivate topic-related vocabulary.

scorePolicy:
COURSE REQUIREMENTS AND POLICIES: 
1.　　Tardiness: Don’t be late. You will lose points for being late. (遲到會扣分  2次遲到等於1次缺席) 
2.　　Absence: You will lose points for being absent. (出席很重要 缺席曠課會扣分) 
3.　　If you are absent for 5 times, you CANNOT pass this class. Show your teacher your Proof of Absence if you cannot come. (曠課五次或以上 出席及參與成績0分 / 請遵守學校請假程序)
4.　　無故缺考期中或期末考試者 該次考試成績以零分計算
5.　　Please turn off or MUTE your cell phone during class time. (上課請勿使用手機 請把收機收好)
6.　　Keep the classroom clean. (垃圾請帶走 保持教室乾淨)

EVALUATION:
     Attendance = 10%
     Participation = 20%
     Group Report = 10%  (3-5ppl / 10-15mins)
     Midterm paper (個人) = 10 %
     Midterm = 20%
     Final Exam = 30%
